title: Explore the farmer's grape growing process: High-tech agriculture| Farming Documentary

tasks.task: Grappling with advanced agriculture technology in modern farming methods to cultivate and harvest premium grape varieties for exquisite wine.
subtasks: Selecting high-quality grape varieties and performing grafting onto well-prepared, rooted grafts.
Nurturing the planted vines in specialized gardens using modern agricultural technology to optimize growth.
Carrying out onam pruning to remove unnecessary branches, shaping plants, and focusing nutrients on fruit quality.
Utilizing specialized pruning shears for manual harvesting of high-end varieties, ensuring fruit integrity.
Employing harvesting machines for large-scale operations to separate grapes from vines without damaging the fruit.
Transferring harvested grapes to processing facilities for sorting, crushing, fermentation, and aging.
Implementing advanced winemaking technology to maintain quality and control during treatment.
Packaging aged wine, bottling, and labeling for distribution.

tasks.task: Producing the world's most expensive grapes in Japan using high-tech agriculture and traditional techniques.
subtasks: Grafting seedlings in greenhouses with modern technology to control light and temperature.
Manually pruning and cleaning grape gardens to prepare for the next cultivation cycle.
Removing underdeveloped grapes, using precision techniques to nurture only the best.
Protectively bagging individual grape clusters from pests and weather.
Hand-picking each grape for the highest quality, carefully packing them for transport.

tasks.task: Combining tradition with advanced agricultural technology for premium grape and wine production.
subtasks: Demonstrating dedication and expertise in every step of cultivation and harvesting.
Integration of Koyomi technology, O-pruning, and regenerative agriculture practices.
Highlighting the seamless blend of Japanese craftsmanship and modern machinery in vineyards.
Showcasing the transformation from meticulous grape care to award-winning wines in farm documentaries.
